meanings.definition: Contrary to or forbidden by law.
meanings.sent2: It is illegal to drive without a license.
meanings.sent3: It would be quite illegal to park in the middle of the highway!
meanings.sent4: His actions were like an illegal move in a game of chess.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of illegal activities can be severe.

meanings.definition: Not allowed or approved by authorities.
meanings.sent1: Wearing pajamas to a formal event is illegal.
meanings.sent2: Smoking in this area is illegal.
meanings.sent3: It would be illegal to bring a pet elephant into the movie theater!
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was an illegal combination of patterns.
meanings.sent5: The teacher made it clear that cheating was illegal in the classroom.
